segments.text: We're having a tailgate party I before the game . Would you like to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . But what is a tailgate party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Someone brings a truck to the game and we have a barbecue right there in the parking lot out of the back of the truck !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How fun ! Can I bring something ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about it ! Just come at five .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I make a mean potato salad !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you insist , you are welcome to bring a potato salad !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I'll see you in the parking lot at five ! Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2
